title: Biden says 'major war crimes' being discovered in Ukraine after he announces new sanctions on Russia - CNN
content:
1. Biden says 'major war crimes' being discovered in Ukraine after he announces new sanctions on Russia  CNN
  2. US targets Putin's daughters with sanctions after evidence of atrocities in Ukraine surfaces  Fox News
  3. Your Thursday Briefing: Ukrainians Flee the East  The New York Times
  4. Putin's daughters: Hear how they could be targeted with sanctions  CNN
  5. What Putin Has Said About Daughters Katerina Tikhonova, Maria Vorontsova  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: President Joe Biden declared "major war crimes" were being discovered in Ukraine as Russian forces retreat from areas around Kyiv, citing scenes of brutal, cold-blooded executions as rationale for ratcheting up US sanctions on Moscow.
